name: cnvsn

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), csn(cop(c1, c0))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), csn(cop(c1, c0)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), csn(cop(c1, c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), csn(cop(c1, c0)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), csn(cop(c1, c0))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), csn(cop(c1, c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), csn(cop(c1, c0)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Converse of a singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-1998.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 12-Feb-2022.)
